== Version Control ==

=== Subversion ===
Subversion (or svn, for short) is a fairly old but still widely used form of version control that was designed to replace cvs.<<BR>>

More Resources:
1. <nowiki>[[http://svnbook.red-bean.com/]]</nowiki>

=== Bazaar ===
Bazaar (or bzr, for short) is a newer version control system designed and programmed by Canonical, the sponsor behind Ubuntu. It is the only form of version control system on <nowiki>[[Launchpad]]</nowiki>.<<BR>>

More Resources:
1. <nowiki>[[http://bazaar.canonical.com/]]</nowiki>
2. <nowiki>[[http://doc.bazaar.canonical.com/latest/en/user-guide/]]</nowiki>
